mapper.select: SELECT fare_id fareId , start_name startName, arrive_name arriveName, type_one typeOne, type_two typeTwo, type_three typeThree, type_four typeFour, type_five typeFive, type_light_car typeLightCar FROM fare WHERE start_name LIKE #{startName} AND arrive_name LIKE #{arriveName}

SELECT fare_id fareId , start_name startName, arrive_name arriveName, type_one typeOne, type_two typeTwo, type_three typeThree, type_four typeFour, type_five typeFive, type_light_car typeLightCar FROM fare
